<title level="1" right="Spell 6" pfs="Standard">
[Phantasmal Calamity](/Spells.aspx?ID=1630)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 349 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Deities**
[Imot](/Deities.aspx?ID=671), [Lady Nanbyo](/Deities.aspx?ID=311), [Rhan-Tegoth](/Deities.aspx?ID=577), [Scal](/Deities.aspx?ID=410), [Wulgren](/Deities.aspx?ID=562), [Zyphus](/Deities.aspx?ID=361)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 500 feet

**Area** 30-foot burst

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Defense**
Will

</row>

</column>

---

A vision of apocalyptic destruction fills the mind of each creature in the area. The vision deals 11d6 mental damage ([basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Will save). On a critical failure, the creature must also succeed at a Reflex save or believe it's trapped (stuck in a fissure, adrift at sea, or some other fate in keeping with its vision). If it fails the second save, it's also [stunned](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36) for 1 minute. It can attempt a new Will save at the end of each of its turns, and on a success, it disbelieves the illusion and recovers from the stunned condition.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 2d6.
name: Phantasmal Calamity
